subject: Re: @Ignore with date
msgSnippet: Here is another use case for a parameter to @Ignore. We do our development on Linux, PCs, and Macs but deploy on Linux boxes. There are some features of our
messageBody:
Here is another use case for a parameter to @Ignore. We do our development on Linux, PCs,
and Macs but deploy on Linux boxes. There are some features of our software that will only
run on the Linux systems and their unit tests reflect that. It would be great if we could mark
those tests to be ignored when run on the other machines.
